QuestData.Title: Judgment Call
QuestData.Description:
Oh no... No no no... What have I done?
The elders will never take me back. They shall cast me out as they did Firim.
Please, outsider, speak to Elder Amir in Pilgrim's Grace. Give him my thanks for sending you, and tell him all that has happened here. He will understand why I must never return.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Amir in Pilgrim's Grace.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Elder Amir in Pilgrim's Grace.
QuestData.RewardText:
Tahli is alive? And you preserved an automa archive with her help?! Oh, my. That is... a lot to take in.
And, of course, her guilt has prevented her from returning home. Oh, Tahli.
